feedback: All acceptance criteria met with 354 tests passing and code review approved. No blocking issues. Non-blocking debt items noted for optional future improvement (test file naming convention and documentation enhancements).

iteration_history.summary: App module implementation is technically sound with all 119 tests passing and all acceptance criteria met. However, there is a critical blocking issue: the app module is not exported in lib.rs, making it inaccessible to library consumers. This violates Rust project structure conventions. Additionally, integration tests are missing from the tests/ directory. These must be fixed before approval.

All acceptance criteria met with 354 tests passing and code review approved. No blocking issues. Non-blocking debt items noted for optional future improvement (test file naming convention and documentation enhancements).
